location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.175 of 1856 from Commander Felix Jones, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter relates to a slave imported to Ras al Khyma [Raâ€™s al-Khaymah] from Africa by a Muscat vessel. Jones writes that the slave has requested to return to his country, and that he has been put on a vessel to Bombay for this purpose.
